author: uschindler
msg: merge the doExplain cleanup from trunk.

author: stephenc
msg: [MENFORCER-87] Adding two new parameters to requireNoRepositories which can allow the permission of repositories which are only enabled for snapshots
These two parameters default to false.
In actuality, when true they just ban repositories which are enabled for releases. So you could have a repository which was enabled for nothing, and that would be OK. I see that as being no harm

author: uschindler
msg: Improvement in NumericRangeTermEnum to reuse the term and not intern the field name everytime. It also throws UnsupportedOperationException in endEnum() method, which is not used, and should not be used by client code/subclasses (undefined behaviour).
Also adds a test for the TermEnum.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2209: Fixed SetBody to not propagate specialized Message object so its the same as transform for example.
